request.description: Get all bookings for the authenticated user.
Get details of a specific booking. Response includes type-specific fields (e.g., package_title, activity_title) and generic item_image.

Review a booking before confirmation. This creates a draft booking and returns pricing details, taxes, and applied coupons.

Fields:
- booking_type: stay | package | activity | cab | houseboat (required)
- property_id: Property ID (required for stay)
- check_in: Check-in date (required)
- check_out: Check-out date (required)
- coupon_code: Optional coupon code
- items: Array of booking items (same structure as Create Booking)

Response:
- booking_id: ID of the draft booking (use this for confirmation)

query.description: ID of the draft booking to retrieve review details

request.description: Retrieve details of a draft booking using its ID. This is useful for re-fetching the review page.

Confirm a draft booking by providing traveller details.

Path Params:
- booking_id: ID of the draft booking returned from Review Booking API

Fields:
- title: Mr | Ms | Mrs (required)
- full_name: Name of primary guest (required)
- email: Email address (required)
- phone: Phone number (required)
- country_code: Country code (e.g., +91)
- special_requests: Optional text
- is_gst_required: Boolean (true/false)
- gst_number: Required if is_gst_required=true
- company_name: Required if is_gst_required=true
- company_address: Required if is_gst_required=true
List all valid coupons.
